title: Github Forensics
description: A client has requested assistance after a network compromise caused a full outage. Preliminary forensic analysis shows the attack originated from a single user account, indicating a potential insider threat. Investigate the incident to identify the insider and determine the actions taken during the attack. You have been given the compromised user's github profile - https://github.com/EMarseille99 What plaintext password was discovered in the userâ€™s repositories during the investigation?
hints: Take a look throughout the years for activity on the account. The value you find may need to be decoded from a popular encoding type
